title: Mr Tech King
description:
We bring the world of software and AI to your fingertips with:
1. AI Tools and Websites Finder: Discover the perfect AI tools and websites tailored by describing your task

Our Website Features:
1. 300+ Curated AI Websites: Browse our categorized library of 300+ handpicked websites and tools.
2. Curated Tech Stories: We summarize the most important technology news into bite-sized newsletter
3. AI Tips & Tutorials: Stay informed with our blog, offering practical tips, guides.
